title: recipes_Crissi's_Sweet_Potato_Biscuits
text:
Title: Crissi's Sweet Potato Biscuits.
.
Description: Use your leftover sweet potatoes in this yummy biscuit recipe made with wheat germ and seasoned with nutmeg or cardamom..
.
Ingredients:.
- 1 cup sifted all-purpose flour.
- 0.25 cup toasted wheat germ.
- 2 tablespoons baking powder.
- 0.5 teaspoon salt.
- 0.33333334326744 cup butter, melted.
- 0.25 cup evaporated milk, heated.
- 1 cup mashed sweet potatoes.
- 2 tablespoons milk.
- 1 pinch ground nutmeg.
.
Instructions:.
- Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Grease a baking sheet..
- Into a large bowl, sift together the flour, wheat germ, baking powder, and salt. Mix in butter, evaporated milk, sweet potatoes, milk, and nutmeg, stirring by hand until dough is smooth..
- On a lightly floured board, roll out the dough until it is about 1/2-inch thick. With a sharp knife, cut into 3-inch squares or diamonds. Place squares on greased baking sheet, and bake for 15 to 20 minutes. Serve warm..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 230 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 27 g.
cholesterolContent: 31 mg.
fiberContent: 2 g.
proteinContent: 5 g.
saturatedFatContent: 7 g.
sodiumContent: 618 mg.
sugarContent: 2 g.
fatContent: 12 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 6 servings.
